And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> say <S%G2036><s%> ought <S%G5100><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , ye shall say <S%G2046%G3754><s%> , The Lord <S%G2962><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> ; and <S%G1161><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> he will send <S%G649><s%> them <S%G846><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, It is written <S%G1125><s%> , My <S%G3450><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> shall be called <S%G2564><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of prayer <S%G4335><s%> ; but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> have made <S%G4160><s%> it <S%G846><s%> a den <S%G4693><s%> of thieves <S%G3027><s%> .

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2641>left<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, and <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G1854>of<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G963>Bethany<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G835>lodged<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> as he was <S%G1321>teaching<s%>, and <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G1722>By<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> doest <S%G4160>thou<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>? <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%>?

¶ But <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> ye <S%G5213><s%> ? A certain man <S%G444><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons <S%G5043><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G4334><s%> to the first <S%G4413><s%> , and said <S%G2036><s%> , Son <S%G5043><s%> , go <S%G5217><s%> work <S%G2038><s%> to day <S%G4594><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> vineyard <S%G290><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G4334><s%> to the second <S%G1208><s%> , and said <S%G2036><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%> . And <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> , I <S%G1473><s%> go , sir <S%G2962><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G565><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> .

Whether <S%G5101><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them twain <S%G1417><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of his father <S%G3962><s%> ? They <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, The <S%G4413>first<s%>. <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , That <S%G3754><s%> the publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the harlots <S%G4204><s%> go <S%G4254><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> .

¶ Hear <S%G191><s%> another <S%G243><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> : There was <S%G2258><s%> a certain <S%G444%G5100><s%> householder <S%G3617><s%> , which <S%G3748><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> a vineyard <S%G290><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> hedged <S%G5418><s%> it <S%G846><s%> round about <S%G4060><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> digged <S%G3736><s%> a winepress <S%G3025><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> built <S%G3618><s%> a tower <S%G4444><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G1554><s%> it <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1554><s%> to husbandmen <S%G1092><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> went into a far country <S%G589><s%> :

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> of the fruit <S%G2590><s%> drew near <S%G1448><s%> , he sent <S%G649><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the husbandmen <S%G1092><s%> , that they might receive <S%G2983><s%> the fruits <S%G2590><s%> of it <S%G846><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> the husbandmen <S%G1092><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> , and beat <S%G1194><s%> one <S%G3739%G3303><s%> , and <S%G1161><s%> killed <S%G615><s%> another <S%G3739><s%> , and <S%G1161><s%> stoned <S%G3036><s%> another <S%G3739><s%> .

Again <S%G3825><s%> , he sent <S%G649><s%> other <S%G243><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> than the first <S%G4413><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> they did <S%G4160><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> last of all <S%G5305><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%> his <S%G846><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> , saying <S%G3004><s%> , They will reverence <S%G1788><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> when the husbandmen <S%G1092><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> , they said <S%G2036><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> , This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the heir <S%G2818><s%> ; come <S%G1205><s%> , let us kill <S%G615><s%> him <S%G846><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> let us seize <S%G2722><s%> on his <S%G846><s%> inheritance <S%G2817><s%> .
